response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product, while valued at $15,000 to us, offers significant benefits that I believe would be worth $8,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the value it brings, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
